result.markdown: --- title: "Week 6: Exponential smoothing" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Simple exponential smoothing * Exponential smoothing methods with trend * Exponential smoothing methods with seasonality * ETS model notation ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 8.1-8.2 and 8.5 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-6, 16, 17 from [Section 8.8 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth-exercises.html). ## Monday lecture Download slides ## Tuesday workshop [Activities for Tuesday workshop](activities.qmd) ## Assignments * [Assignment 2](../assignments/A2.qmd) is due on Friday 25 April. ## Weekly quiz * [Week 6 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868371) is due on Sunday 13 April.
